ARTICLE.TITLE: Goshen business owner wants protesters to be heard
ARTICLE.TEXT: BREMEN [mdash] Mary Ellen Borkholder, 82, of Bremen, passed away at 4:30 a.m. Friday, Aug. 14, 2020, at her residence. She was born April 3, 1938, in Topeka, to Joe J. and Fannie M. (Miller) Miller. On Oct. 10, 1957, she married Tobias J. Borkholder in Etna Green. He preceded her in death Ja…
